Row.Text: Commercial Farming
Wealthy individuals plan to buy and commercialize small farms near {2_city}, unless local farmers can increase their revenues.
Invest in a culture of traditional farming.
Support the mergers with treasury incentives.
Allow the purchases without interference.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +3
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Food: +2
[ICON_GOLD] Gold: +1
[ICON_TEAM_3] Traditional farmers are a strong part of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture near {2_city}.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Commercialization improved farm [ICON_FOOD] Food near {2_city}.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Buyouts improved farm [ICON_GOLD] Gold near {2_city}.
Mine Strike
Mine operators near {2_city} are expanding production, but workers are on strike because of hazardous conditions in the mine.
Support improvements to work conditions at the mine.
Hire strike breakers to continue production.
Let the mine operator handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Food: +2 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +3 per turn
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +1 per turn
[ICON_TEAM_3] Miners from {2_city} receive better [ICON_FOOD] Food, ending a strike.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Swiftly ending a strike of {2_city}'s mine expanded [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
[ICON_TEAM_3] A mine near {2_city} expanded [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Village Protests
Citizens in a village near {2_city} are angry about high poverty and crime in their region.
Improve education to help the poor qualify for better jobs.
Improve the police force to lower crime rates.
Distribute propaganda to boost morale.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH] Science: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Gold: +1 per turn
[ICON_TEAM_3] A village near {2_city} improved [ICON_RESEARCH] Education for the poor.
[ICON_TEAM_3] A village near {2_city} improved [ICON_GOLD] Revenue with a crackdown on crime.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Propaganda improved public morale for villagers near {2_city}.
Plantation Demand
Demand is rising for the crops of a plantation near {2_city}, where workers harvest the fields for low pay.
Enact laws to improve pay and conditions for workers.
Lower trade barriers to strengthen the export economy.
Let the plantation owners handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Food: +2 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Gold: +1 per turn
[ICON_TEAM_3] A strong workforce improved plantation [ICON_FOOD] Food output near {2_city}.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Lower trade barriers improved plantation [ICON_GOLD] Income near {2_city}.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Rising demand improved plantation [ICON_GOLD] Income near {2_city}.
Exotic Camp Animals
Exotic animals were discovered outside the camp near {2_city}.
Create an animal preserve to improve tourism revenue.
Build a lodge to enhance hunting revenue.
Let the trappers handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Gold: +1 per turn

[ICON_TEAM_3] An exotic hunting lodge improved [ICON_GOLD] Gold near {2_city}.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Exotic animals discovered near {2_city} improved hunting [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Quality Quarry
An unusually high quality rock vein was discovered in the quarry outside {2_city}.
Hire artisans to craft sculptures per turn
Fund extra machinery to speed mining operations.
Let the quarry manager handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +3 per turn
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +1 per turn

Exotic Lumber
Exotic trees were discovered near the lumbermill outside {2_city}.
Create a national park to improve tourism.
Build new infrastructure for lumber exports.
Let the lumber business handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +3 per turn
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +1 per turn

Pasture Fencing
Farmers near {2_city} want to build more fences to keep out livestock,[NEWLINE]but ranchers are concerned about the loss of grazing land.
Support the efforts of farmers to fence the land.
Support the efforts of ranchers to keep an open range.
Let the local citizens handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Food: +2 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +3 per turn
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +1 per turn

[ICON_TEAM_3] Ranchers near {2_city} increased [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from an open range.
[ICON_TEAM_3] A compromise between ranchers and farmers near {2_city} improved livestock [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Fishing Demand
Demand is rising for the marine life found in seas near {2_city}.
Build infrastructure to expand the local fishing industry.
Set catch quotas to limit supply and raise revenues.
Let local fisheries handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Food: +2 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 150[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold: +3 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Gold: +1 per turn
[ICON_TEAM_3] Fishermen near {2_city} expanded [ICON_FOOD] Food output.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Catching rare marine life near {2_city} earns lots of [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Rare marine life near {2_city} improved [ICON_GOLD] Gold from fishing.
Well Expansion
An oil business wishes to expand near {2_city}, but the tourism industry is concerned about impact on the landscape.
Support the tourism business with a new national monument.
Support oil development with new roads and infrastructure.
Let the businesses handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +6 per turn
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +2 per turn

[ICON_TEAM_3] New infrastructure expanded oil [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production near {2_city}.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Oil [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production expanded near {2_city}.
Platform Decommissioning
Several offshore platforms in the oil field near {2_city} exhausted their oil supply.
Support commercial fishing by converting the rigs into artificial reefs.
Dismantle and reuse components for rigs elsewhere in the oil field.
Let the business handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Food: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +6 per turn
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +2 per turn

[ICON_TEAM_3] Offshore platforms improved oil [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production near {2_city}.
Fort Expansion
The general in charge of the fort near {2_city} wishes to start new construction efforts.
Research new military technologies at the fort.
Upgrade the defensive capabilities of the fort.
Let the general handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 300[NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH] Science: +6[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold: +6
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 300[NEWLINE]The fort becomes a Citadel.

[ICON_TEAM_3] A fort near {2_city} expanded weapon research.
Granary Growth
Improvements to the granary in {2_city} are attracting citizens to the city, creating a job shortage.
Provide funds for citizens to find a new place to live.
Hire citizens for a public works program.
Let the mayor handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE]+1 Settler.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE]+2 Workers.
[ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen: +1
[ICON_TEAM_3] The government of {2_city} funded a new settlement program.
[ICON_TEAM_3] The government of {2_city} funded a new public works program.
[ICON_TEAM_3] Population is booming in {2_city}.
Smithy Development
A new smelting process developed by the smithy at {2_city} is potentially hazardous to workers.
Fund research to make the process safer.
Send resources to immediately put the process into production.
Let the mayor handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH] Science: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +6 per turn
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production: +2 per turn

[ICON_TEAM_3] A new smelting process improved [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in {2_city}.
Market Monopoly
A business providing large donations to local schools is forming a monopoly on the market in {2_city}, driving up prices.
Split up the monopoly to increase market competition.
Support the educational donations with treasury incentives.
Collect the taxes on higher prices.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH] Science: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Gold: +2 per turn

[ICON_TEAM_3] Higher prices from a monopoly on {2_city}'s market increased [ICON_GOLD] Gold revenues.
Library Controversy
A controversial book about racism in the history of {2_city} is sparking riots.
Fund deeper research into the city's turbulent past.
Ban the book until the riots fade.
Let the historians handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_RESEARCH] Science: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness: +2 per turn
[ICON_RESEARCH] Science: +2 per turn
[ICON_TEAM_3] A controversial book starts further [ICON_RESEARCH] Research into the history of {2_city}.

[ICON_TEAM_3] Historians are [ICON_RESEARCH] Researching the turbulent past of {2_city}.
Monument Controversy
Citizens in {2_city} are protesting an old monument to imperialist expansion.
Give speeches promoting a peaceful culture.
Distribute propaganda supporting militaristic expansion.
Let the mayor handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness: +2 per turn
[ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +2 per turn

[ICON_TEAM_3] The [ICON_CULTURE] Cultural borders of {2_city} expand faster from an imperialist resurgence.
Walled Slums
Development of {2_city} expanded beyond the old city wall, with the inner districts deteriorating to slums.
Revitalize the old city with cultural programs.
Tear down the slums to make room for new businesses.
Let the mayor handle this.
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_CULTURE] Culture: +6 per turn
[ICON_GOLD] Cost: 200[NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold: +6 per turn
[ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen: +1

[ICON_TEAM_3] Districts within {2_city}'s old walls turned to slums as the population boomed.
Barracks Conscription
Mandatory conscription is causing anger among citizens of {2_city}.
Propose a voluntary system to your advisers.
Start a pro-enlistment propaganda campaign.
Let the mayor handle this.

Colosseum Attendance
The colosseum in {2_city} is drawing unusually crowds.
Host massive shows of patriotic propaganda.
Show elaborate competitions to entertain the public.
Let the mayor handle this.

Scout Savior
Your scout rescued the child of a tribal chieftain from a ferocious animal. The grateful village elders offer to teach your scout their wilderness knowledge.
Train to explore vast distances faster.
Train to move quickly with hunting bows.
Train to brave dangerous battles.
+15 [ICON_WAR] Experience for the Scout.
Upgrade to an Archer who ignores terrain.
+20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength from Morale.
